tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE painting_competition (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    participant_email VARCHAR(100),
    judging_criteria TEXT,
    score FLOAT,
    winner BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE judging_criteria (
    criteria_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    criteria_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE winners (
    winner_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id UUID REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    prize VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    painting_title VARCHAR(255),
    painting_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Entries (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    painting_title VARCHAR(255),
    entry_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Winners (
    winner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    entry_id INT,
    judge_id INT,
    winning_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (entry_id) REFERENCES Entries(entry_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES Judges(judge_id)
);
